fr.sii.ogham.core.builder.configurer

Interface Configurer<B>

  • Type Parameters:
    B - the type of the builder to configure
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MessagingConfigurer, SpringMessagingConfigurer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDefaultThymeleafEmailConfigurer, AbstractDefaultThymeleafSmsConfigurer, AbstractSpringSendGridConfigurer, DefaultCloudhopperConfigurer.CloudhopperConfigurer, DefaultFreemarkerEmailConfigurer.FreemakerConfigurer, DefaultFreemarkerSmsConfigurer.FreemakerConfigurer, DefaultJavaMailConfigurer.JavaMailConfigurer, DefaultMessagingConfigurer, DefaultOvhSmsConfigurer.OvhSmsConfigurer, DefaultSendGridV2Configurer.SendGridV2Configurer, DefaultSendGridV4Configurer.SendGridV4Configurer, DefaultThymeleafV2EmailConfigurer.ThymeleafV2EmailConfigurer, DefaultThymeleafV2SmsConfigurer.ThymeleafV2SmsConfigurer, DefaultThymeleafV3EmailConfigurer.ThymeleafV3EmailConfigurer, DefaultThymeleafV3SmsConfigurer.ThymeleafV3SmsConfigurer, FreemarkerConfigurer, MessagingConfigurerAdapter, NoTemplateEngineConfigurer, SmsglobalServiceProviderConfigurer.SmsglobalConfigurer, SpringCloudhopperConfigurer, SpringEnvironmentConfigurer, SpringGeneralMessagingConfigurer, SpringMailConfigurer, SpringOvhSmsConfigurer, SpringSendGridV2Configurer, SpringSendGridV4Configurer, ThymeLeafConfigurer

    public interface Configurer<B>
    Apply specific configuration to the provided builder instance.

    This is useful to separate some parts of builder configuration.

    Author:
    Aurélien Baudet

    • Method Summary

      Apply configuration on the provided builder
